text: The men's 50 kilometres walk competition at the 2018 Asian Games took place on 30 August 2018 at the Gelora Bung Karno Stadium. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text- align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=150|Event |- | Thursday, 30 August 2018 || 06:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Records== == Results == ;Legend *DNF — Did not finish *DSQ — Disqualified {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || align=left| || 4:03:30 || |- | || align=left| || 4:06:48 || |- | || align=left| || 4:10:21 || |- | 4 || align=left| || 4:14:13 || |- | 5 || align=left| || 4:32:20 || |- | — || align=left| || DNF || |- | — || align=left| || DSQ || |- | — || align=left| || DSQ || |} ==References== Men's 50 kilometres walk 2018 men 50km
title: Athletics at the 2018 Asian Games – Men's 50 kilometres walk
